name: project
description: This is an example project for MIOJSLibs

scripts.scss:watch: npm run scss && npm run scss -- -w app
scripts.init: mkdir -p ./app/libs && mkdir -p ./app/libs/miojslibs && npm install && cd ../.. && npm install && cd templates/project && npm run update-libs && npm run scss

author: Mátyás Budavári <budavariam@gmail.com> (https://budavariam.github.io)
